data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of West Siang words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of West Siang, Arunachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of West Siang
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in West Siang, Arunachal Pradesh, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, train the church of West Siang, Arunachal Pradesh, India to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in West Siang, Arunachal Pradesh, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 112,300 citizens of West Siang, Arunachal Pradesh, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in West Siang, Arunachal Pradesh, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: West Siang
location.people_groups_list: Tangsa Taisen, Puroik, Tanu, Bangru, Tagin
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tangsa Taisen (1,100), Puroik (4,400), Tanu (44,000), Bangru (200), Tagin (61,000)
